data.eml:eml: Pseudopontonides plumosus sp. nov., a new cnidarian-associated pontoniine shrimp (Crustacea, Decapoda, Palaemonidae) from Curaçao *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Snijders, Nicolette, Fransen, Charles H. J. M. (2010): Pseudopontonides plumosus sp. nov., a new cnidarian-associated pontoniine shrimp (Crustacea, Decapoda, Palaemonidae) from Curaçao *. Zootaxa 2372: 7-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193699
